// JEI
jei.wt_bauble.desc: Can be worn as a Bauble
jei.wt_booster_old.desc: 在無線合成終端GUI中插入無限增幅卡來為無線合成終端提供無限範圍。
jei.wt_booster.desc: Insert up to 2.14 billion of these into the appropriate slot in the WCT to add the the internal Infinity Energy which allows the WCT to be used outside of the WAP range and across dimensions.
jei.wut.desc: A terminal which is made by combining other terminals and then gains the functionality of the added terminals.
